page.description: Gather statistical information about the actual tables in the schema.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

argument.name: <SQL::Schema>
argument.description: A SQL::Schema created with a DIM statement.

argument.name: Connection
argument.description: A SQL::Connection object created with a DIM statement.

page.discussion: The SQL::Schema.UpdateStatistics() method returns information on the tables in the schema for the specified connection.
